text: There ’ s the Wheel of Impressions, the Wheel of Musical Impressions, the Wheel of Decisions, and the Wheel of Freestyle. For Letitia Wright, the breakout star of Black Panther who knows how to drop a beat, Jimmy Fallon brought out the latter. The Tonight Show host refereed a freestyle trade - off between Wright and The Roots ’ Tariq Trotter ( a. k. a. Black Thought ). Pressing the random topic generator, the actor ’ s first challenge was to piece a rap together that mentioned “ disco, ” “ Red Lobster, ” and the “ vibranium ” metal from Black Panther. What followed were gems like, “ Yo, yo, let ’ s grab some food at Red Lobster / Roots, tell me
